headline: Sempra Named to Dow Jones Sustainability Index North America for 14th Consecutive Year
summary: Sempra (NYSE: SRE) has been named to the Dow Jones Sustainability Index (DJSI) North America for the 14th consecutive year, reflecting the company's commitment to responsible business practices that aim to reduce risk, improve operational excellence and promote financial stewardship. The DJSI North America noted Sempra outperforms its peers in several categories, including risk and crisis management, community relations and information security and cybersecurity, among other areas.
